name: Langfuse
headline: Open source LLM engineering platform
description:
Traces, evals, prompt management and metrics to debug and improve your LLM application.
Onboard via https://langfuse.com

Langfuse helps you build and improve LLM applications across the entire lifecycle: 
- Develop: Observability, Langfuse UI & Prompt Management
- Monitor: Traces, Analytics, Metrics & Evaluations
- Test: Experiments, Releases & Datasets

We are hiring: https://langfuse.com/careers

founders.name: Marc Klingen, Founder
founders.description: Marc has diverse experience across Product, Sales, Business Intelligence and full-stack engineering at companies from large (Google, DHL) to early stage startups. He graduated within the top 1% of his Masters in Management and Computer Science from Technical University Munich. Besides that, he loves to hack on personal project and connect with other builders (something he does not get to too much right now).

founders.name: Maximilian Deichmann, Founder
founders.description: Max built trading systems at European 5bn Fintech, Trade Republic. He knows the ins and outs of building reliable, scalable systems to handle our customers’ most critical business processes. While Max started out studying Management in undergrad, he quickly found his love for computer science and transitioned into engineer self-taught and with a graduate degree.

founders.name: Clemens Rawert, Founder
founders.description: Before starting Langfuse, Clemens worked with the founder-CEOs of German Fintech Unicorn Scalable Capital including a unicorn fundraising, an acquisition and helped scale the org and team from 100 - 400 employees. On another note, he studied Economic History, dropped out of a PhD at Oxford, and was a competitive wine taster.

System
# Open SourceLLM Engineering Platform
[Traces](https://langfuse.com/</docs/tracing>), [evals](https://langfuse.com/</docs/scores/overview>), [prompt management](https://langfuse.com/</docs/prompts/get-started>) and [metrics](https://langfuse.com/</docs/analytics/overview>) to debug and improve your LLM application.
[Try demo](https://langfuse.com/</docs/demo>)[View docs](https://langfuse.com/</docs>)
[![Langfuse Github stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/langfuse/langfuse?label=langfuse&style=social)](https://langfuse.com/<https:/github.com/langfuse/langfuse>)[Backed by](https://langfuse.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/langfuse>)[![Langfuse won #1 Golden Kitty in AI Infra Category](https://langfuse.com/_next/static/media/ph_gke_ai_infra.0802cdcd.svg)![Langfuse won #1 Golden Kitty in AI Infra Category](https://langfuse.com/_next/static/media/ph_gke_ai_infra_white.e2058228.svg)](https://langfuse.com/<https:/www.producthunt.com/golden-kitty-awards/hall-of-fame>)
[![Product Hunt - Product of the Day](https://langfuse.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fph_product_of_the_day_light.78658049.png&w=640&q=75)![Product Hunt - Product of the Day](https://langfuse.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fph_product_of_the_day_dark.5463e03e.png&w=640&q=75)](https://langfuse.com/<https:/www.producthunt.com/posts/langfuse-2-0?utm_source=badge-top-post-badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_souce=badge-langfuse>)

## Teams building complex LLM apps rely on Langfuse

## Tools for the full development workflow
All Langfuse features are tightly integrated with Langfuse Tracing.
[Explore docs ](https://langfuse.com/</docs>)
[![Tracing](https://langfuse.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbento_trace.9fbc29ab.png&w=3840&q=75)![Tracing](https://langfuse.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbento_trace_dark.4a7cd731.png&w=3840&q=75)TracingDetailed production traces to debug LLM applications faster.Learn more](https://langfuse.com/</docs/tracing>)[![Prompt Management](https://langfuse.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbento_prompt_management.7462f047.png&w=3840&q=75)![Prompt Management](https://langfuse.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbento_prompt_management_dark.77d8ec01.png&w=3840&q=75)Prompt ManagementVersion and deploy prompts collaboratively and retrieve them with low latency.Learn more](https://langfuse.com/</docs/prompts/get-started>)### [PlaygroundTest different prompts and models right in the Langfuse UI.Learn more](https://langfuse.com/</docs/playground>)### [EvaluationCollect user feedback, annotate in Langfuse, and run evaluation functions in Langfuse.Learn more](https://langfuse.com/</docs/scores/overview>)### [DatasetsDerive datasets from production data to fine-tune models and test your LLM application.Learn more](https://langfuse.com/</docs/datasets/overview>)[![Metrics](https://langfuse.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbento_metrics.59aed9f4.png&w=3840&q=75)![Metrics](https://langfuse.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbento_metrics_dark.95efdd68.png&w=3840&q=75)MetricsTrack cost, latency, and quality.Learn more](https://langfuse.com/</docs/analytics>)

## Proudly Open Source
Langfuse is committed to open source. You can also run it [locally](https://langfuse.com/</self-hosting/local>) or [self-hosted](https://langfuse.com/</self-hosting>).
[GitHublangfuse/langfuse:8.7K⭐️](https://langfuse.com/<https:/github.com/langfuse/langfuse>)

## Enterprise Security
Langfuse is built with security in mind. Langfuse Cloud is SOC 2 Type II and ISO 27001 certified and GDPR compliant.
[Security ](https://langfuse.com/</docs/data-security-privacy>)[Enterprise FAQ ](https://langfuse.com/</enterprise>)
![ISO 27001](https://langfuse.com/_next/static/media/iso27001.e3c0ad66.svg)![SOC 2](https://langfuse.com/_next/static/media/soc2.4bb529b5.svg)![GDPR](https://langfuse.com/_next/static/media/gdpr.1ce6e473.svg)
# Pricing
Get started on the Hobby plan for free. No credit card required.
Langfuse Cloud (we host)Self-hosted (you host)
Hobby
Get started, no credit card required. Great for hobby projects and POCs.
[Sign up](https://langfuse.com/<https:/cloud.langfuse.com>)
Free
  * All platform features (with limits)
  * 50k observations / month included
  * 30 days data access
  * 2 users
  * Community support (Discord & GitHub)


Pro
For production projects. Includes access to full history and higher usage.
[Sign up](https://langfuse.com/<https:/cloud.langfuse.com>)
$59/ month
  * Everything in Hobby
  * 100k observations / month included, additional: $10 / 100k observations
  * Unlimited data access
  * Unlimited users
  * Unlimited evaluators
  * Support via Email/Chat


Team
Dedicated support, and security controls for larger teams.
[Sign up](https://langfuse.com/<https:/cloud.langfuse.com>)
$499/ month
  * Everything in Pro
  * 100k observations / month included, additional: $10 / 100k observations
  * Custom SSO, SSO enforcement
  * Fine-grained RBAC
  * SOC2, ISO27001
  * Support via Slack


Enterprise
Enterprise-grade support and security features.
[Talk to sales](https://langfuse.com/</schedule-demo>)
Custom
  * Everything in Team
  * Uptime SLA
  * Support SLA
  * Custom Terms & DPA
  * Dedicated support engineer
  * Architecture reviews
  * Billing via AWS Marketplace


For a detailed comparison and FAQ, see our [pricing page](https://langfuse.com/</pricing>).

## Tools for the full development workflow
All Langfuse features are tightly integrated with Langfuse Tracing.
Explore docs ⟨4⟩
![Tracing⟨42⟩![Tracing⟨43⟩]TracingDetailed production traces to debug LLM applications faster.Learn more](https://langfuse.com/</docs/tracing>)![Prompt Management⟨44⟩![Prompt Management⟨45⟩]Prompt ManagementVersion and deploy prompts collaboratively and retrieve them with low latency.Learn more](https://langfuse.com/</docs/prompts/get-started>)### PlaygroundTest different prompts and models right in the Langfuse UI.Learn more⟨46⟩### EvaluationCollect user feedback, annotate in Langfuse, and run evaluation functions in Langfuse.Learn more⟨16⟩### DatasetsDerive datasets from production data to fine-tune models and test your LLM application.Learn more⟨47⟩![Metrics⟨48⟩![Metrics⟨49⟩]MetricsTrack cost, latency, and quality.Learn more](https://langfuse.com/</docs/analytics>)

## Enterprise Security
Langfuse is built with security in mind. Langfuse Cloud is SOC 2 Type II and ISO 27001 certified and GDPR compliant.
Security ⟨97⟩Enterprise FAQ ⟨98⟩
![ISO 27001⟨99⟩]![SOC 2⟨100⟩]![GDPR⟨101⟩]
# Pricing
Get started on the Hobby plan for free. No credit card required.
Langfuse Cloud (we host)Self-hosted (you host)
Hobby
Get started, no credit card required. Great for hobby projects and POCs.
Sign up⟨14⟩
Free
  * All platform features (with limits)
  * 50k observations / month included
  * 30 days data access
  * 2 users
  * Community support (Discord & GitHub)


Pro
For production projects. Includes access to full history and higher usage.
Sign up⟨14⟩
$59/ month
  * Everything in Hobby
  * 100k observations / month included, additional: $10 / 100k observations
  * Unlimited data access
  * Unlimited users
  * Unlimited evaluators
  * Support via Email/Chat


Team
Dedicated support, and security controls for larger teams.
Sign up⟨14⟩
$499/ month
  * Everything in Pro
  * 100k observations / month included, additional: $10 / 100k observations
  * Custom SSO, SSO enforcement
  * Fine-grained RBAC
  * SOC2, ISO27001
  * Support via Slack


Enterprise
Enterprise-grade support and security features.
Talk to sales⟨102⟩
Custom
  * Everything in Team
  * Uptime SLA
  * Support SLA
  * Custom Terms & DPA
  * Dedicated support engineer
  * Architecture reviews
  * Billing via AWS Marketplace


For a detailed comparison and FAQ, see our pricing page⟨8⟩.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Langfuse**

**Mission**: Langfuse is an open-source platform designed for engineering applications using large language models (LLMs). It aims to enhance the development, monitoring, and debugging of these applications throughout their lifecycle.

**Founding & Team**: Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's W23 batch, Langfuse is based in Berlin, Germany, with a team of 7 dedicated employees. Their group partner is Gustaf Alstromer, which underscores their strong foundation in the startup ecosystem.

**Core Offerings**: Initially started as a tool called "Traces," Langfuse has evolved to provide a suite of features that include:

- **Develop**: Tools for observability including a user-friendly UI and prompt management.
- **Monitor**: Features for tracing, analytics, metrics, and evaluations to keep track of application performance.
- **Test**: Capabilities for conducting experiments, managing releases, and handling datasets.

**Community and Support**: Langfuse strongly believes in the open-source model, allowing users to host the platform either locally or via self-hosting options. Their commitment to community engagement is evident through their Discord and GitHub channels, where users can seek help and collaborate.

**Technology & Integrations**: The platform supports SDKs for both Python and JavaScript/TypeScript, along with native integrations for popular libraries and standards like OpenTelemetry, making it flexible and accessible for developers.

**Security Compliance**: Langfuse takes data security seriously. Their cloud service is SOC 2 Type II and ISO 27001 certified, and the platform adheres to GDPR compliance, making it suitable for enterprise use.

**Pricing Plans**: Langfuse offers a freemium model:
- **Hobby Plan**: Free; 50k monthly observations.
- **Pro Plan**: $59/month for more extensive use.
- **Team Plan**: $499/month; advanced features and support for larger teams.
- **Enterprise Plan**: Custom pricing with tailored support and security needs.

**Current Focus**: Langfuse focuses on building tools that help teams efficiently debug and enhance complex LLM applications, which has driven their recognition in the industry—culminating in awards like the #1 Golden Kitty in the AI Infrastructure category on Product Hunt.

For more information or to get involved, visit their [official website](https://langfuse.com) or check out their [career opportunities](https://langfuse.com/careers).
